content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to be a great place to live. Let's discuss the price. How much are you willing to pay per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm very interested in the apartment, and I'm looking to get the best deal possible. I'm willing to pay a fair price for the location and amenities it offers. Could you please tell me your lowest possible price?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu, I understand that you're looking for a good deal. The location and amenities of this apartment are indeed very attractive. However, I'm not able to discuss my lowest price. I can only negotiate based on the price you're willing to pay. So, please tell me how much you're willing to offer for the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your time and the opportunity to negotiate. I'm looking to pay around 700 Euros per month for the apartment. Is this within your acceptable range?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu, your offer of 700 Euros per month is a good start, but I'm looking for a price that reflects the value of the apartment. It's a brand new, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom in the city center, with easy access to all amenities. Could you consider increasing your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand that the apartment is of high quality and in a prime location. However, as a student, I'm on a budget. Could you provide me with a counter-offer that you believe is fair? I'm open to considering a higher price if it's justified by the apartment's features.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu, as a landlord, I do my best to provide fair prices for my apartments. For this particular unit, considering its location and amenities, I would be willing to accept a price closer to 900 Euros per month. This would be a fair reflection of the value of the apartment. Would you be willing to consider this offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your counter-offer of 900 Euros per month is quite high for my budget as a student. While I appreciate the quality of the apartment, I must find a price that is affordable for me. Could we perhaps meet in the middle? I'm willing to pay 800 Euros per month, which I believe is a fair compromise. What do you think?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu, your offer of 800 Euros per month is more reasonable, but still not quite what I'm looking for. The apartment is in high demand due to its central location and modern features. I'm willing to come down slightly from my initial counter-offer, but I'm hoping for a price closer to 850 Euros per month. This would be a good middle ground, in my opinion. Would you be willing to meet at this price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer of 850 Euros per month is more in line with what I'm willing to pay. It's still a bit higher than my budget, but considering the quality of the apartment, I'm willing to make an exception. I think this is a fair deal, and I'd be happy to agree to the price of 850 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu, I'm glad to hear that you're willing to agree to the price of 850 Euros per month. This is a fair deal for both parties, and I believe you'll be very satisfied with the apartment. I look forward to having you as a tenant. Let's proceed with the lease agreement. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
